JointModel-All.description: Deep learning model for morphological segmentation, morpheme tagging, part-of-speech (POS) tagging, and syntactic parsing onto dependencies, using cross-level contextual information flow for every word, from segments to dependencies, with an attention mechanism at horizontal flow.
JointModel-All.bibtex:
@article{can2022joint,
title={Joint learning of morphology and syntax with
cross-level contextual information flow},
author={Can Buglalilar, Burcu and
	Alecakir, Huseyin and
	Manandhar, Suresh and
	Bozsahin, Cem},
year={2022},
publisher={Cambridge University Press}}
JointModel-All.citation:
Can, B., Alecakir, H., Manandhar, S. and Bozsahin, C.
(in press) Joint learning of morphology and syntax with 
cross-level contextual information flow.
Natural Language Engineering.
